document_data.name: Conn Cymrych
document_data.mainbody: '''Conn Cymrych''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid-to-late 9{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} He inherited a High Kingship that was severely weakened, owing to the loss of the ''[[Crown of the High King]]'' by his father.{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|27}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the first son of his predecessor, High King [[Dolan Cymrych|Dolan]]. His successor was his own first son, [[Byron Cymrych II]].
document_data.History:
Conn assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|852}}, following the death of his father, who went down in a sea battle against [[Illuskan]] invaders and took the ''Crown of the High King'' with him.

Conn ruled for thirty-three years before also dying in battle against the Northmen in the {{YearlinkName|885}}.
